The "Poseidon" facility is the biggest and most advanced hydrogen production plant designed to date. With only a single operational site remaining, it is considered a vital strategic asset.
- Indestructible building

Renowed for decades of groundbreaking research, the "Pontus" facility's projects are vital to several fields, from the development of new antibiotics, all the way to camouflage technology for military applications.
- Indestructible building

The "Becquerel" site, named after the man who discovered the photovoltaic effect, is host to the largest solar array and energy storage facility ever built. Its remote location and elevated structure have allowed the site to remain in a pristine state for decades.
- Indestructible building

"Zvezda" is the world's most efficient fusion reactor based on breakthroughs on magnetic confinement. Military analysts around the world maintain that whoever controls this technology, controls the future.
- Indestructible building

The "Njord" site is the largest concentration of highly advanced wind turbines. Their ability to produce consistent, and re-newable energy was an attestation to the ever-improving alternative sources of energy.
- Indestructible building

The "New Eden" site built on the successes of its predecessor in Cornwall, England. The facility provides invaluable insights in helping regenerate the world's environment, and serves as a platform for advanced hydroponics research and applications.

- Indestructible building

The "Ambrosia" Vault is the single-most comprehensive store for global crop seeds, making it an integral part of the efforts to re-cultivate various locations around the world.
- Indestructible building
Refines crude oil into more useful forms for military and civilian applications.

The Suez Canal is a site of paramount importance, letting nations traverse from the Mediterreanean to the Red Sea with ease. With almost 50 ships traversing it a day, it is without question one of the most vital locations within the Middle East.
Mines precious rare materials used in the production of advanced technologies.

Complexes are the beacons of civilization. Offering the best quality of life, they are mankind's best shot at a fresh start.
- Radiation Dome automatically starts to charge if the city is uncontaminated and has a minimum population of 4
- Speeds up building construction by 5%

Complexes are the beacons of civilization. Offering the best quality of life, they are mankind's best shot at a fresh start.
- Grants 50 VICTORY POINTS when dome is fully charged
- Completely shields buildings and population from damage while dome is intact
- Dome goes offline and needs to fully recharge when conquered by another player
- Dome automatically fully recharges over 24 hours
- Speeds up building construction by 20% while dome is intact
Hives are a sign of severe infestation in a city. Undead appear in much greater numbers, and fight more viciously. Whatever local morale is left is eradicated over night.
Outpost serves as a base of operations in the area. Enforcers spawn in greater numbers.
Refines crude oil into more useful forms for military and civilian applications.

The Suez Canal is a site of paramount importance, letting nations traverse from the Mediterreanean to the Red Sea with ease. With almost 50 ships traversing it a day, it is without question one of the most vital locations within the Middle East.
Mines precious rare materials used in the production of advanced technologies.
